summary: This mod makes the pickaxe and axe become an actual weapon. They do more damage, are upgradable, and craftable.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes the pickaxe and axe become an actual weapon. They do more damage, are upgradable, and craftable.

Please Download and Endorse

If this is popular enough I will make a dragonborn version for the Ancient Nord Pickaxe.

Perk Addon: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56733/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56733/[/url]
The perk addon makes it so the perk Bone Crusher affects Axes and Pickaxes
author: austin1298
